```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv('../Data/CSV/01_crime_in_the_united_states_by_volume_and_rate_per_100000_inhabitants_1996-2015.csv')
```
```{r}
x <- subset(data, select=c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 17, 18))
colnames(x) <- c('year', 'population', 'violent_crime', 'violent_crime_rate', 'murder', 'murder_rate',
                 'rape', 'rape_rate', 'robbery', 'robbery_rate', 'assault', 'assault_rate', 'Burglary',
                 'burglary_rate')
x <- x[-c(21, 22, 23), ]
x['year'] <- c(1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008,
               2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015)
write.csv(x, file = "01_crime_in_the_united_states_1996-2015.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(x, aes(year, violent_crime_rate)) + geom_point() +
         labs(x = "Year", y = "Violent Crime Rate")
```
